name: Gibbons Love Bananas!
description:
What is it?

Gibbons Love Bananas! is a short little clicker game where you collect bananas from the Banana Storm to give to the Gibbon! Use leftover bananas collected in order to purchase upgrades to help you collect more of the falling bananas, faster! Features 4 unique purchasable upgrades, a win condition, and a mute button in case you don't want to hear my terrible attempt at "music."

This is the first feature complete game I've ever made, and also the first game I've ever made with 100% original assets. I'm not very good at art, and I'm terrible at  music, but at least I can say it's mine!

Known bugs:

*Bananas don't always get destroyed when touching a basket, but they will still count towards your score.

*If there are too many sounds at once, the volume will drop a lot and many sounds will be hard to hear.

*Bananas can still be clicked for a short time after they fall below the UI.

*If clicked fast enough (with a macro only), bananas can be clicked multiple times.

*Gibbon's animations will bug out if you are earning bananas too fast (animation is supposed to be on a 3-second minimum cooldown, not sure why this happens)
